name: Poetry Slam (Danseo)
description:
You are the finest poet to have ever graced the Internet, famous for hosting the annual Poetry Slam stream. Poets far and wide log on to show off their rhymes in record time! However, in a fit of jealousy, a lyrically-lacking Twitch streamer has broken into your home and stolen several key haikus off of your computer. Now it’s you versus your trolls to regain the verses you lost before your big night!

Controls:

J & K: Lower notes

D & F: Upper notes

Esc: Pause
